name: Colonoscopy_Event_Grouping
title: Colonoscopy_Event_Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Colonoscopy.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Colonoscopy utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Colonoscopy utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Colonoscopy utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Colonoscopy utilization in patients/users connected health.)
